item.title: Konami Press Start live stream set for June 12 featuring Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, Silent Hill f
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/konami-press-start-live-stream-set-for-june-12-featuring-metal-gear-solid-delta-snake-eater-silent-hill-f

Konami will host a “Konami Press Start” live stream on June 12 at 6:00 a.m. PT / 9:00 a.m. ET / 22:00 JST, featuring game news and updates, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese).

The 37-minute program will feature appearances from Konami developers and producers, with extended looks at Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, Silent Hill f, “and more.”

Stay tuned.
